attributes.action: Dissolve parliament by a vote of no confidence in the Conservative government
attributes.background:
A party is voted for by the British voting public based on its manifesto.  This is essentially the mandate a party is given.
The Conservative government have repeatedly broken this mandate and acted against the manifesto people voted for. Their premiership should therefore be void.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104544 

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
